DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial investigate relative bioavailability BI 144807 tablet formulation compare oral solution formulation single dose administration ( intermediate high dose ) fast condition . Further objectives assess whether extent food affect single dose pharmacokinetics BI 144807 administered tablet , compare relative bioavailability two different tablet formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Drug Trial Healthy Male Subjects Determine Compare Blood Concentrations BI 144807 Following Administration Oral Solution Tablet Under Fasted Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy male subject Exclusion criterion : Any relevant deviation healthy condition
